guidance_text:
3C48549S -or- 09J03234S
Note: Allstyle brand (formerly Lendell) commenced operations in May of 1990. Early systems used style 1 (manual numbering system). Most later units will be style 2 (computer generated). Starting in 2000, the serial number for style 2 will begin with two digits, the first being a "0" (zero) prior to 2010, or "1" (one) prior to 2020, etc.
Back to Brand Listing
